post.body: I hear ya!!! Mu husband is the same way!!
Have fun tonight! Snag me just 1 cookie?!?!
Can he make it home?? I hope so!!
BTW - UPS came thru!!! My package had 5 gifts in it!!
This is kind of fun! http://www.noradsanta.org/en/home.html
UPS Package is 'out for delivery'! Yes!!!
The busy day begins! Still have wrapping to do, soup to make, a few things to pick up @ the store!! (& a late UPS package to stress over!)
I'm a little bummed. I think it has come time to stop nursing. Any advice on how NOT to be bummed out by this???
Trying to track some Christmas gifts via UPS. They gave the WRONG tracking number! Additional stress...
Christmas cancelled at the in-laws due to weather. Now I can finish shopping & wrapping!!!
Still not done shopping, wrapping or baking. I don't think it's all going to happen. PLUS - have to go to in-laws today.
Starting to get gifts ready - hope to finish the shopping today as well.
So daycare decides to close 5 mins after they were supposed to open???
Day care delayed - don't know how we're gonna work this one out yet...
Watching hubby help the neighbor snowblow his driveway. They look so cute out there!
All schools cancelled. I hope day care is still open!
This snow has turned my husband into a BIG KID!
Now that is some serious snow!! It's beautiful!
More snow - they say up to a foot. I wonder what we'll ACTUALLY end up getting?
Getting ready for the snow!! I hope this shapes up to be a proper snow storm this time.
